title: Nubie 64
brief_description: This documentary produced by the ‘Institut Geographique National’ describes the UNESCO’s programme to save the temple complex of Abu Simbel under the threat of total submersion by the damming of the Nile river at Assouan.
description: This documentary produced by the ‘Institut Geographique National’ describes the UNESCO’s programme to save the temple complex of Abu Simbel under the threat of total submersion by the damming of the Nile river at Assouan.
